channel.title: Game Development on Sam's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in Game Development on Sam's Journey

item.title: Quadrant
item.description: Quadrant is the first game development project during my time at the University of Hull. {{}} {{}} {{}} Quadrant is a 4 player competitive board game, where each player takes it in turn to fill their Quadrant of the game board, what is represented by their colour. The aim is to be the first player to reach the score limit.
